document.discussion_title: Java John Z's : Rhino Outlet "Give Mom Freedom" Travel Wallet Giveaway
document.topic_text: Sunday, April 24, 2016 Rhino Outlet "Give Mom Freedom" Travel Wallet Giveaway Here we have a giveaway with two winners. Check out the latest in RFID blocking technology. Giveaway is open to US/CAN residents and runs through 5/7. Good luck. The Security Travel Money Wallet will indulge you with freedom and more fun. Versatile and lightweight, you will want to wear it everywhere you go to keep your cell phone, keys and cash secure and at hand. Be burdened no more with dragging along or losing a bulky purse at the playground, grocery store, school or sports event, gym or trips to Disney. Rhino Outlet made it stylish so it looks great worn over clothing for easy access to valuables, or hide it beneath a shirt, sweater or jacket to keep shifty eyes and pickpockets at bay. Just perfect to wear on a night out with the ladies or on a cruise ship! We know moms are picky and for good reason, so we added durable, tear resistant nylon, handy zipper pulls, extra compartments, and special RFID blocking fabric to protect chips from digital theft. Busy creative moms everywhere have been discovering many uses for our travel wallet, including as a coupon holder. Read why we know this is The Gift Mom Will Wear Every Day and find out how you can order one right now on Amazon ! Social Corner How would you like the opportunity to WIN one of these amazing wallets for your mom or for yourself? We're giving away TWO WALLETS to two lucky people! Details are listed below! "Give Mom Freedom" Giveaway Our giveaway is open to the US/CAN residents age 18 and older. The giveaway will end on May 7, 2016 at 11:59PM EST . Many thanks to all of the contributing bloggers who help to make each of our giveaways a success by sharing them with their readers and followers. You guys rock! Sponsored by:
